That's a great idea! Focusing the Q&A session on questions related to your blog post and the products you'll be sharing can help generate buzz and excitement around the upcoming post. It's a great way to tease the content and give your audience a sneak peek into what they can expect.

For the Product Demo session, you could choose a few products that will be featured in your blog post and demo them live. This could include showing how to use the products, sharing your favorite ways to incorporate them into your routine, and answering questions from your audience.

For the Skincare Routine session, you could share your morning or nighttime skincare routine, and answer questions from your audience about your favorite products, techniques, and tips. This could also be a great opportunity to share some exclusive content that won't be featured in your blog post.

Here's an updated outline for the Instagram Live sessions:

**Week 1:**

* Tuesday, 2 pm EST: Instagram Live - Q&A Session (30 minutes)
	+ Focus on questions related to your blog post and the products you'll be sharing
	+ Encourage your audience to ask questions in the comments or use the "Question Sticker" feature

**Week 2:**

* Tuesday, 2 pm EST: Instagram Live - Product Demo (30 minutes)
	+ Choose a few products that will be featured in your blog post and demo them live
	+ Share your favorite ways to use the products and answer questions from your audience
* Friday, 2 pm EST: Instagram Live - Skincare Routine (30 minutes)
	+ Share your morning or nighttime skincare routine
	+ Answer questions from your audience about your favorite products, techniques, and tips

By focusing the Instagram Live sessions on topics related to your blog post, you can create a sense of continuity and build excitement around the upcoming content. Remember to promote the sessions on your Instagram feed and stories to encourage your audience to tune in!
